requirements.summary: Add a global "Request an update" action in the main layout that opens a modal with freeform instructions and a copy-to-clipboard flow with success/error toasts.
acceptanceCriteria: There is a visible "Request an update" action accessible from the main layout (header or footer).
Clicking the action opens a modal containing: (1) a multiline text input, (2) a "Copy to clipboard" button, and (3) a "Close" button.
The "Copy to clipboard" button copies the modal text content to the clipboard and shows a success toast; failures show an error toast.
All user-facing text is in English.

file_operations.description: Create a reusable RequestUpdateModal component that uses the shadcn-ui Dialog component to render a modal containing: a multiline text field for update instructions, a "Copy to clipboard" button that uses the browser clipboard API, and a "Close" button. Use Sonner to show a success toast on copy success and an error toast on failure. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a visible "Request an update" action in the footer (main layout) that opens/closes RequestUpdateModal (state managed in Footer). Ensure the modal includes the required controls and all user-facing text remains in English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
